titles.title: A resolution designating June 10, 2009, as "National Pipeline Safety Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/10/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates June 10, 2009, as National Pipeline Safety Day. Encourages: (1) pipeline safety stakeholders to use the day to create greater public awareness of advancements that can lead to greater pipeline safety; and (2) individuals throughout the United States to become aware of pipelines that run through their communities and encourage safe gas and hazardous liquid pipeline practices and damage prevention.
